resources.string: [You are welcome to share your Feedback, suggest Enhancements, report any bugs or usability Issues, and provide any additional Comments!]
Click to get back to Vibro
This is the channel of alarm notifications

Apps running in the background may be halted by the Android system for battery preservation (Battery Optimization). This could lead to disruptions in app functionality shortly after your screen turns off. 
To prevent such occurrences, it's important to deactivate battery optimization for this app, in addition to adjusting specific settings based on your device's manufacturer and Android version. 

A step-by-step guide is here to assist you in rectifying this situation. 

Please follow the instructions that align with your device's specifications: 

..specifications.. 
The guide: Dontkillmyapp.com
